greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the k-th prime = 1 (mod n).
maple: Tj := proc(n,k) option remember: local j,p: if(k=0)then return 0:fi: for j from procname(n,k-1)+1 do if(isprime(n*j+1))then return j: fi: od: end: A077316 := proc(n,k) return n*Tj(n,k)+1: end: seq(seq(A077316(n,k),k=1..n),n=1..15); # _Nathaniel Johnston_, Sep 02 2011
xref: Cf. A034694 (first column), A077317 (main diagonal), A077318 (row sums), A077319, A093870, A193869 (row products).
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Nov 04 2002
ext: Edited and extended by _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Aug 29 2006
